creator: yo.shady@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 30802
poi adds excel drawing on top of filter cell

I am using setAutoFilter to add filters on my report.

It does add filters on my header cells but also add a transparent drawing on top of the cell which make the filter look like as if it is disable

I have to right click and cut/delete the transparent drawing from the cell top to make filter work

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: Sorry for the late response, but I think we need some way of reproducing this before anyone can take a closer look.
